Scale a 3D vector

Inlets

Inlet Data Type Use
1 float/signal x input
2 float/signal y input
3 float/signal z input
4 float/signal x scalar
5 float/signal y scalar
6 float/signal z scalar

Outlets

Outlet Data Type Return
1 signal x scaled
2 signal y scaled
3 signal z scaled

Arguments

Arg Data Type Use
1 float x scalar
2 float y scalar
3 float z scalar
